projectDescription: A mobile-first website for a local pizza joint. Compressed and fresh out of the oven., view the available pizzas and filter by your topping of choice. Create and place an order and have the receipt emailed.
projectTech: This project utilized React, Nodejs, JavaScript, CSS, GraphQL, Gatsbyjs, Sanityio

projectDescription: A virtual Pokedex designed to catalogue and provide information regarding the various species of Pokemon featured in the Pokemon video game, anime and manga series.
projectTech: This project utilized React, Nodejs, JavaScript, CSS, HTML

projectDescription: Vireo was created to provide information for users upon request to manage and prepare for their next trip. Users can get a information about a country like the Key Phrases in the native language, currency, top 5 Restaurants, Museums, Sightseeing Spots, Fun facts and travel restrictions. Users can also create a post about their recent trip and read other users posts.
projectTech: This project utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Node, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Handlebars, Axios
